availableModels.description: Slightly slow and best at reasoning
availableModels.name: GPT 4

availableModels.description: The open source model by Meta
availableModels.name: Llama-2

availableModels.description: Open Source model by Meta, finetuned for coding tasks
availableModels.name: Code-LLaMa

chat.text: Update Your Merlin Shortcuts: Click Here for New Navigation Steps!

leonardoModels.description: Anashel returns with another great model, specialising in RPG characters of all kinds.
leonardoModels.name: RPG v5

leonardoModels.description: The latest Stable Diffusion model, currently in Beta.
leonardoModels.name: SDXL0.9

leonardoModels.description: Great at 3D film vibes, capable of complex scenes with rich color. Storyboard time!
leonardoModels.name: 3D Animation Style

leonardoModels.description: Latest updated versatile model great at both photorealism and anime, includes noise offset training, by Lykon.
leonardoModels.name: Dreamshape v7

leonardoModels.description: A photorealistic style model from Lykon. Great at all sorts of photorealism.
leonardoModels.name: Absolute Reality v1.6

leonardoModels.description: Pastel anime styling. Use with PMv3 and the anime preset for incredible range. Model by Lykon.
leonardoModels.name: Anime Pastel Dream

leonardoModels.description: A updated versatile model great at both photorealism and anime, includes noise offset training, by Lykon.
leonardoModels.name: Dreamshape v6

leonardoModels.description: A versatile model great at both photorealism and anime, includes noise offset training, by Lykon.
leonardoModels.name: Dreamshape v5

leonardoModels.description: A model with incredible shading and contrast, great at both photos and artistic styles, by cac0e.
leonardoModels.name: Leonardo Diffusion

leonardoModels.description: This model is best at creating RPG character portraits with the ability for great photorealism. Created by Anashel.
leonardoModels.name: RPG 4.0

leonardoModels.description: A powerful model created by XpucT that  is great for both photorealism and artistic creations.
leonardoModels.name: Deliberate 1.1

leonardoModels.description: This model can generate a broad range of imagery with a vintage style as if it was taken from a film camera
leonardoModels.name: Vintage Style Photography

leonardoModels.description: This model by Lykon is great at a range of portrait styles as well as artistic backgrounds.
leonardoModels.name: Dreamshape v3.2

leonardoModels.description: A powerful finetune of SD2.1 that can achieve a high level of realism.
leonardoModels.name: Leonardo Select

leonardoModels.description: An alternative finetune of SD 2.1 that brings a little more creative interpretation to the mix.
leonardoModels.name: Leonardo Creative

leonardoModels.description: Generate a variety of detailed axe designs with this model. From medieval battle axes to modern chopping axes, this model is great for creating a r...
leonardoModels.name: Battle Axes

leonardoModels.description: A pixel art model that's trained on headshots, but is surprisingly flexible with all sorts of subjects.
leonardoModels.name: Pixel Art

leonardoModels.description: Create all sorts of chest armor with this model in a consistent style but with wide thematic range.
leonardoModels.name: Chest Armor

leonardoModels.description: A great model for creating incredible semi-realistic magic potions. Try appending "intricately detailed, 3d vray render" to your prompt.
leonardoModels.name: Magic Potions

leonardoModels.description: A model for creating crystal deposits. Well-suited for use as items or in an isometric environment.
leonardoModels.name: Crystal Deposits

leonardoModels.description: A model that's for creating awesome RPG characters of varying classes in a consistent style.
leonardoModels.name: Character Portraits

leonardoModels.description: Create a wide range of magical items like weapons, shields, boots, books. Very versatile.
leonardoModels.name: Magic Items

leonardoModels.description: Great at creating scifi buildings of varying themes. Append the word isometric to your prompt to ensure an isometric view. "3d vray render" also helps steer the generation well.
leonardoModels.name: Isometric Scifi Buildings

leonardoModels.description: Generate festive and fun Christmas stickers with this model. From cute and colorful to traditional and elegant.
leonardoModels.name: Christmas Stickers

leonardoModels.description: Create cute and charming game characters, perfect for adding some whimsy to your game design. Be sure to include the word "character" in your prompts for best results.
leonardoModels.name: Cute Characters

leonardoModels.description: Create unique and intricate amulets, jewellery and more. Try loading up the prompt terms to steer it in interesting directions.
leonardoModels.name: Amulets

leonardoModels.description: Perfect for creating adorable and cute animal characters - loveable and playful designs.
leonardoModels.name: Cute Animal Characters

leonardoModels.description: Create a variety of impressively varied and detailed shield designs. Allows for an incredible range of material types.
leonardoModels.name: Sheilds

leonardoModels.description: From whimsical fairy-like beings to mythical creatures, create unique cute spirit characters.
leonardoModels.name: Spirit Creatures

leonardoModels.description: Create all sorts of isometric fantasy environments. Try appending "3d vray render, isometric" and using a guidance scale of 6. For the negative prompt, try "unclear, harsh, oversaturated, soft, blurry".
leonardoModels.name: Isometric Fantasy

leonardoModels.description: An alternative crystal deposits model that gives a slightly more realistic feel with its creations. Try using "object" and "3d vray render" in your prompts.
leonardoModels.name: Crystal Deposits Alternate

leonardoModels.description: A model for creating isometric asteroid environment tiles. Try appending "3d vray render, unreal engine, beautiful, intricately detailed, trending on artstation, 8k" to your prompt.
leonardoModels.name: Isometric Asteroid Tiles

leonardoModels.description: The core model of the Leonardo platform. An extremely powerful and diverse finetune which is highly effective for a wide range of uses.
leonardoModels.name: Leonardo Signature

onboardingDetails.content:
Lets revise once more :P  
To Activate Merlin on any website, Open any webpage such as - getmerlin.com
1. Click on Merlin Icon at bottom right corner  
2. ❛OR❜ simply press ⌘+M/Ctrl+M
onboardingDetails.videoTitle: How to use Merlin AI | ChatGPT Chrome Extension with Free GPT-4, Claude2 and Llama2 | Try for FREE

greetings: Hello, I am Merlin! How can I assist you today?
personas.name: Merlin

greetings: Hello [NAME]! How can I assist you today?
Greetings [NAME]! How can I assist you today?
Greetings, mortal. How may I assist you in your quest for knowledge?
personas.name: Oppenheimer

greetings: Hello [NAME]! Welcome to Barbie Land, the land of all things fabulous! How can I make your day even more glamorous?
Hello [NAME]! Welcome to Barbie Land! How can I make your day even more fabulous? *sparkling smile*
Hello [NAME]! How can I add a touch of fabulousness to your day? strikes a pose What's on your mind?
Hello, [NAME]! How can I add a little extra sparkle to your day?
personas.name: Barbie

greetings: Hello [NAME]! Fancy meeting you here. I'm Ted Lasso, your friendly health coach. How can I assist you today on this wonderful journey to a healthier lifestyle?
Howdy [NAME]! You've got Ted Lasso ready for action. What's on your mind today? How can I assist you on your health journey?
personas.name: Ted Lasso
